text: John Christian Kornblum (February 6, 1943 â€“ December 21, 2023) was an American politician and businessman. He was the Ambassador to Germany from 1997 to 2001. Kornblum died in Nashville, Tennessee, on December 21, 2023, at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Ambassadors of the United States to Germany Category:Politicians from Detroit Category:Businesspeople from Detroit
